name: Dell OptiPlex All-in-One Articulating Stand | Dell USA
description: The Dell™ OptiPlex All-in-One Articulating Stand maximizes productivity and comfort in the workplace for users of OptiPlex 3240 and 5250 All-in-One systems. With the ability to both tilt your monitor forwards and backwards and lower it on the desk to a 60 degree angle, you can ensure a comfortable and productive workspace.
